entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this morning. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 29 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 05 March 2023
